Uses of Class
org.apache.hadoop.io.retry.RetryPolicy.RetryAction

  • Packages that use RetryPolicy.RetryAction 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.io.retry
    A mechanism for selectively retrying methods that throw exceptions under certain circumstances.
